name: Faulty Forklift
description:
You work in a warehouse moving boxes and pallets, but management is cheap and the budget for maintenance is...nonexistent. Consequently, you've only got a limited number of moves to complete each task of moving a parcel to the designated loading zone.

Plan out your moves carefully so you can get the job done before you...run out of controls...

Controls:

up arrow = drive forward
down arrow = drive backward
right arrow = turn clockwise
left arrow = turn counterclockwise
space = toggle the fork position
R = restart level
escape = quit game

Made in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam (Theme: "Out of Control")
